title: Meta Breaking Champions + Roles?
body:
I've had a lot of fun with a few of them, including:

AP {{champion:54}} Mid

AP {{champion:111}} Mid

AP {{champion:267}} Mid

(A lot of mids, I know :P)

Any other champion and lane to do? I still have to do full AD attack speed {{champion:111}} , maybe the same with {{champion:57}} .

Edit: thanks for all the suggestions! They seem really fun. I'll try them all eventually XD

replies.body: Jungle {{champion:44}} is a lot of fun. That's what I play when my friends and I do ranked teams all "support" champs.
Jungle taric is actually hilarious. I need to pick that up and AD fizz jungle.

I don't own {{champion:105}}  :P

SO MANY THINGS I CAN'T DO ITS FRUSTRATING XD
HOW MANY CHAMPIONS DO YOU NOT OWN? XD
Like 65 :P
.-. oh

I will get all of them at some point. But mainly suggested ones...
SOON™

(Note to all people: Trademark can be created using ALT + 0153. Requires Num lock enabled and a keyboard numpad.)

EDIT: Windows 8 is scrubby. Doesn't work on W8. Gives out Ö instead :(

Sounds good :)
Ill get taric after pantheon and try it out. 

What kind of build would i have, a tanky one, an Ad, Ap, anything specific?
Not sure if serious....but if you are, and it works, that would be hilarious.
Is jungle Twisted Fate a thing? I mean, he has decent wave-clear and could benefit from any of the jungle items. His ganking potential post level 6 would also be outright fabulous.

Let's find out :)

I'm guessing he's a flare jungler, or a wraith jungler. I'll give both a shot a few times.
Galio mid. Just Galio mid.
That's actually not very un-meta-like, but alright :)

Kog'maw top.
Just shred any health stacking tank( e.g cho'gath)

EDIT: I usually would go for a botrk vs tanks, and from there just attack damage/speed. No idea how optimal it is, but it works for me.

I don't own {{champion:96}}  :(

I would get him but I really want {{champion:80}} first.

Any others you can think of?

EDIT: AD, AP, or on hit?
AP {{champion:18}} mid.

That's actually pretty well known, but ok I'll give it a shot :P

(no puns intended)
Pun should always be intended!
Note made.
Support Ashe and Top Shaco are fun.
Heard of support {{champion:22}} , gotta try top {{champion:35}} . Thanks!

With top shaco you can start boxes at level 1 and steal the enemies red, then head top, or you can start shiv and just poke down the enemy laner.  You ussually want to start Doran's ring to help with mana and to give your spells a lil more damage, then go the normal AD assassin build (Hydra, etc.).

Jungle Garen

Ap tryndamere idk if it actually works though

Ap Pantheon once you get him, stun and ult are a 1:1 ratio

Ad Jarvan 4th
Jungle blitzcrank

Ap Warwick mid 

theres a bunch
Gonna try some of those, thanks(late reply much)
also just skarner in general

Don't have the scorpion :(

At some point ill try it out.

Ap trynd used to work, and work annoyingly well, but he was rebalanced with the sole purpose of killing that off-color build.

Oh and I faced an AP panth, AD Alistar bot lane once. Thought they were crazy......I lost horribly. Alistar gets *so* much AD from his ultimate.
yeah I would imagine, what is it like 45-60 or somthing at level 1? I can't remember haven't played ali in awhile

60/75/90 per skill level. It's ridiculous. When i was crushed by it the ali started with brawler's gloves and and he managed to get a single crit in the second he turned 6 and popped his ult. It was like I was paper.
Thanks for the suggestions! I don't own {{champion:59}} or {{champion:53}} , because i suck with blitz and I haven't tried j4. I'll try the rest though :)
{{champion:72}} Support/ap! hella fun!
Don't own him :(

**Support Khartus:**
When you don't need to focus on CS, the poke potential of skittles is just absurd. Wall is a nice slow and that.. uhm.. killsecuring ultimate!

**Amumu top: **
His E has awesome mana-to-dmg ratio and reduces physical dmg+block+unyielding+Dshield. And I don't need to say how full-farm Amumu is awesome.

**Morde support:** Death is the best CC :P Also, manaless poke. 
Either go 0/9/21 and Coin - rather weak early game but nice gold income and that 3%SV.
OR go 0/26/4(MS and trinkets in utility) and Rshield - good early tankiness and sustain from Perserverance and Recovery.

**PS** How the hell can you do here(on CB) the "new line but not new paragraph"? It is either continuously in one line or making one big gap. It is just hurting my feelings...

Don't own {{champion:30}} , but i'll try the other two.

To the PS: Don't think you can.

I play Anivia the Undying, and AP bot Anivia with an Ashe support/kill lane. I've also seem someone try an ADC orianna. (Undying Anivia: Passive, Guardian, Zhonyas, Seraphs Embrace, and tank gear. For added fun, have a Zilean and Yorick on your team!)
Will give that a shot :)

Most of these I've done once or twice, but:

AD Nunu

Nautilus top

Rammus top

Malzahar jungle


Still off-meta, but could still technically fit:

Morde top

Nautilus support
I'll give most of these a shot. I don't own {{champion:33}} or {{champion:90}} though.
soraka mid :^)
{{champion:16}} is the new {{champion:17}} . I'll pass. It is just a nightmare to lane against; I'm not going to put others through that suffering.

Leona Jungle is my soft spot.  She's got a painful clear time and mediocre sustain.  But she scales decently with a real gold income and OH. My. God the ganks.  Rush BoM, terrorize any lane that's remotely even or in your favour.  It falls flat if you can't make the ganks happen, but you have a skillshot to start the fight with that isn't blocked by minions, good CC, and solid damage if the laner is activating you passive.  After you hit six, terrifying.  You do need to invest in an item with offensive stats eventually to keep your clear up(I kinda like wits end, but get a BotRK if ganks are going well, Iceborn is good, too, as is sunfire), and you need to be good at the Leona Triple-tap to have a clear speed that is only mildly laughable to start with.

AP{{champion:37}} 

{{item:3174}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3089}} and you can ult+Q+passive auto any squishy from full health
Tries ap sona mid already, so much fun :)
AP Miss fortune Mid. Max impure shots and build nashors tooth. She basically turns into Kayle, but funnier.
Don't own {{champion:21}}  :(

Triforce Iceborn Gauntlet Alistar mid.

And if you're feeling super trollish, you can duo up with a friend, go adc thresh and have them go support blitzcrank. You WILL laugh your ass off. Trust me, I've tried this.
Well I don't own either thresh or blitz, but I'll try the alistar one out :)
{{champion:16}} Tank farming botlane. Support your support so they can support like a real support.

So {{champion:16}} tank with another support, and you farm?

Sounds good :D
